A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a disappointment. 
The story went nowhere and I didn't care about any of the characters.
There was so much potential to create a compelling story but it was wasted through laziness of the writers and director.
This trilogy needed a good story to begin with where it all started with Luke being a powerfull and charismatic old Jedimaster which led the succesful Jedi academy and Han and Leya still were maried and that the evil and menace not came from an empire version 2 as I call the boring new order but for example from an invading  evil ancient race from outside the galaxy with force powers or something like that. Would be at least much more interesting but they wanted to play it safe.
Very boring movie and I am sad for Mark Hamill.
